attributes.action: Mandate same UK entry requirements for the vaccinated and the unvaccinated.
attributes.additional_details: The system being introduced on the 4th of October 2021 is highly discriminating and has no scientific basis as it has been widely proven that vaccinated individuals can spread the "virus" just like unvaccinated individuals.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to finally admit that the "risk" vaccinated and unvaccinated people are to others is the identical and therefore everyone should be subject to the same rules to enter the UK from the "rest of the world" countries.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239
